summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution Coming Exclusively to Nintendo Switch August 20
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution Coming Exclusively to Nintendo Switch August 20
body:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution Coming Exclusively to Nintendo Switch August 20

EL SEGUNDO, CALIF. – May 21, 2019 – Konami Digital Entertainment, Inc. today announces that Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist: Link Evolution will launch on August 20 at SRP $39.99.Exclusive for Nintendo Switch™, Duelists will experience more than 20 years of Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise history reliving stories from the original animated series through Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V and challenge the newest generation…

View On WordPress

summary: MUSE DASH HITTING SWITCH ON JUNE 20TH, 2019
title: MUSE DASH HITTING SWITCH ON JUNE 20TH, 2019
body: Publisher X.D. Network and developer PeroPeroGames have confirmed that Muse Dash is finally coming to the Switch on June 20th, 2019, and it’s priced at $29.99 / 3,240 yen. The game will launch with a special week-long 10 percent-off discount. The Switch version includes English, Japanese, Korean, and Simplified and Traditional Chinese language options, and includes all downloadable content.

reblog.comment: Publisher X.D. Network and developer PeroPeroGames have confirmed that Muse Dash is finally coming to the Switch on June 20th, 2019, and it’s priced at $29.99 / 3,240 yen. The Switch version includes English, Japanese, Korean, and Simplified and Traditional Chinese language options, and includes all downloadable content.

The Switch version includes English, Japanese, Korean, and Simplified and Traditional Chinese language options, and includes all downloadable content.

blog.name: gamesdelmaizal
blog.title: GAMES DEL MAIZAL
blog.description: Página sobre retrogames, games actuales, reviews, etc...

title: Lego Harry Potter 1-4 (2010, PC)
body:
Juego de la franquicia lego sobre la aclamada saga de fantasía adolescente e infantil de magos y brujas. Como siempre en estos juegos de desarrollo de Lego, hubo una buena aceptación por parte de la critica pero destacar un numero “limitado” de bugs que entorpecen la fantastica jugabilidad. Por otro lado destacar gran repertorio de coleccionables, desbloqueables y multijugador que alarga la experiencia del videojuego. La historia con sus más y sus menos esta bien adaptada con ese toque de humor de Lego y añade nuevos escenarios que no pasan ni en el libro, ni en la pelicula, enriqueciendo el mundo del mitico mago. Es un gran juego al que completar a este periodo de jeugos de lego, eso si, solo acabe la historia junto con unos cuantos desbloqueos de personajes y objetos, no al 100%. Recomendado.

Nota:7/10

Alfonso J.

summary: AETERNOBLADE II OFFICIALLY ANNOUNCED FOR SWITCH
title: AETERNOBLADE II OFFICIALLY ANNOUNCED FOR SWITCH
body:
PQube (London, UK) - May 22nd, 2019 - PQube and developer Corecell Technology are excited to announce AeternoBlade II, a brand-new action/puzzle platformer for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One! Dynamic and versatile time-bending mechanics give a fresh spin to the fast-paced combat and ingenious puzzles, making AeternoBlade II a game to set your watch for this Autumn!

Harness the AeternoBlade and play as three unique characters, including returning heroine Freyja and newcomers Felix and Bernard. Each equipped with an individual set of skills, they journey across dimensions in a desperate struggle against the destruction of the Dark Abyss. The power of the AeternoBlade must be returned or reality, as they know it, will face total collapse

The gameplay of AeternoBlade II is pure poetry that puts puzzle-platforming elements and dynamic combat in perfect sync. Engaging jump'n'run and puzzle passages seamlessly transition into action-packed battles that let you push the game’s visually striking combo system to its limits. Combining both components by using launched enemies as mid-air stepstones to access new areas and much more will challenge your creativity in completely new ways this Autumn!

For more information and the latest news, follow us on Twitter, Facebook, Twitch, Instagram and our official website: http://pqube.co.uk/
